title: (x) Michigan Design Center logo - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {Lari}
content:
Looks too perfect the way the e and s join ... is this a font? Thanks for your help!

| --- | --- |
| [ab\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104815/http:/typophile.com/files/ab_logo.gif) | 1.83 KB |

 [‹ GE Inspira alternative?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104815/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29482 "Go to previous forum topic") [www.abstraction-now.net ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104815/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29492 "Go to next forum topic")
author: link

comments.content: Avant Garde and alternate E. Not sure about that S.
Very nice :) Thanks so much. I ’look’ at the alternates but don’t have a clue how to use them ... is there a guide or is it just ’common sense’ ... and I’m lacking ;)
I think this could be customised regular Avant Garde. The E is a bit different.

\> _is there a guide or is it just ‘common sense’_

That’ll be common sense. Just substitute ligatures for all the letter combinations there are provided for, take a good long look at it and then remove the ones that are too much. The only rule with these things is: “If it looks good it _is_ good”. ;^)
